StratmasClient.treeview
Class StratmasObjectAdapter

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.treeview.StratmasObjectAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, MutableTreeNode, TreeModel, TreeNode, StratmasObjectAdapter, StratmasEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
HierarchyObjectAdapter, PointAdapter
public class StratmasObjectAdapter
extends Object
implements MutableTreeNode, TreeModel, StratmasEventListener, StratmasObjectAdapter

StratmasObjectAdapter adapts StratmasObjects for viewing in the tree.
